name: Mobile App Launch
description: Ship your mobile app to App Store and Play Store

issues.title: Set up React Native project
issues.body:
## Description
Initialize mobile app project

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] React Native initialized
- [ ] Navigation configured
- [ ] State management setup
- [ ] Dev environment working

## Technical Notes
- Expo or bare React Native
- TypeScript recommended

issues.title: Design app UI/UX
issues.body:
## Description
Create app design system

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Wireframes complete
- [ ] Design system
- [ ] Component library
- [ ] Accessibility standards

## Technical Notes
- Follow platform guidelines
- Responsive layouts

issues.title: Implement core features
issues.body:
## Description
Build main app functionality

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] All MVP features
- [ ] Offline support
- [ ] Push notifications
- [ ] In-app purchases (if needed)

## Technical Notes
- Platform-specific code minimized
- Performance optimized

issues.title: Set up backend API
issues.body:
## Description
Create backend services

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] REST/GraphQL API
- [ ] Authentication
- [ ] Database setup
- [ ] File storage

## Technical Notes
- Use Firebase or custom backend
- API versioning

issues.title: iOS testing and optimization
issues.body:
## Description
Test on iOS devices

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] iPhone testing
- [ ] iPad testing
- [ ] Performance optimization
- [ ] Memory leaks fixed

## Technical Notes
- Test on multiple iOS versions
- Xcode Instruments profiling

issues.title: Android testing and optimization
issues.body:
## Description
Test on Android devices

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Multiple device sizes
- [ ] Android versions tested
- [ ] Performance optimization
- [ ] Battery usage optimized

## Technical Notes
- Test on real devices
- Android Profiler usage

issues.title: Beta testing program
issues.body:
## Description
Run beta test with users

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] TestFlight setup (iOS)
- [ ] Play Console beta (Android)
- [ ] Beta testers recruited
- [ ] Feedback collected
- [ ] Issues addressed

## Technical Notes
- Crash reporting configured
- Analytics in place

issues.title: Prepare App Store submission
issues.body:
## Description
Complete App Store requirements

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] App screenshots
- [ ] App preview video
- [ ] Description and keywords
- [ ] Privacy policy
- [ ] App review guidelines met

## Technical Notes
- Follow Apple HIG
- Prepare for review rejection

issues.title: Prepare Play Store submission
issues.body:
## Description
Complete Play Store requirements

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Store listing
- [ ] Screenshots and graphics
- [ ] Content rating
- [ ] Privacy policy
- [ ] Release tracks configured

## Technical Notes
- Google Play policies
- Staged rollout plan

issues.title: Create marketing materials
issues.body:
## Description
Develop launch marketing

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Landing page
- [ ] Social media content
- [ ] Press kit
- [ ] Email campaign

## Technical Notes
- ASO optimization
- Track attribution
